commitResults.messageTitle: Change the ASCII message when Duke runs to HAL9000
Created UserInterface class, to handle all the logic of the Level 0 requirements

commitResults.messageBody: Updated the UserInterface to handle Level-1 requirements
This reverts commit 3d374dce77bd810299c1e39f84bb8ffbccdfa55d.

commitResults.messageTitle: Called UserInterface in Duke.java to start the polling
commitResults.messageBody: Finalised Level-0

commitResults.messageTitle: Updated UserInterface to fulfill Level-1 requirements
commitResults.messageBody: Updated .gitignore to ignore .class files

commitResults.messageTitle: Updated UserInterface to fulfill Level-2 requrements
Updated UserInterface to handle Level-3 requirements
commitResults.messageBody: Created Task class

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Deadline, Event, Todo that extends Task
commitResults.messageBody:
Made Task abstract

Created CommandProccessor to process commands

Updated UserInterface to handle Level-4 requirements

commitResults.messageTitle: Added InputException, ProcessingException to handle Exceptions
commitResults.messageBody: Modified CommandProcessor and UserInterface to fulfil Level-5 requirements

commitResults.messageTitle: Changed CommandProcessor to handle delete command
commitResults.messageBody:
Added ArrayList<> instead of Task[]

Added a new message to pop when list is empty

Fulfilled Level 6 requirements

commitResults.messageTitle: Edited EXPECTED.txt and input.txt for testing

Added Storage encapsulating TempStorage and LocalStorage to handle storage on the txt file and in the ArrayList<Task> Added Codec to decode and encode from Task to String and vice versa Added encode method to Tasks that encode tasks to strings for storage Added identifier field to tasks for encoding/decoding and a new constructor that takes in a boolean "done" as well Added StartUpException to handle issues when the program loads up Updated ProcessingException to handle causes as well
commitResults.messageBody: Level 7 requirements fulfilled

* branch-level-7:
  Added Storage encapsulating TempStorage and LocalStorage to handle storage on the txt file and in the ArrayList<Task> Added Codec to decode and encode from Task to String and vice versa Added encode method to Tasks that encode tasks to strings for storage Added identifier field to tasks for encoding/decoding and a new constructor that takes in a boolean "done" as well Added StartUpException to handle issues when the program loads up Updated ProcessingException to handle causes as well

commitResults.messageTitle: Added TimeProcessor class to handle processing and parsing of time Updated Deadline and Event with the LocalDateTime fields as required Updated InputException to be constructed with a throwable cause as well Fixed catch-all exception handling

commitResults.messageBody:
* branch-level-8:
  Added TimeProcessor class to handle processing and parsing of time Updated Deadline and Event with the LocalDateTime fields as required Updated InputException to be constructed with a throwable cause as well Fixed catch-all exception handling

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Enums in the form of Command Updated UserInterface, CommandProcessor to use Command Updated Event to fix bug when decoding from .txt file Updated Codec to remove redundant lines and utilise ProcessingExceptions constructor with case Added new method exceptionCommandProcessing to make the code neater
commitResults.messageBody: Level 8 requirements fulfilled

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Packaging into ui, command, tasks, exceptions, codec, storage
Added Gradle functionality Added JavaDoc to all files Made changes to adhere to CheckStyle Made changes to access modifiers

commitResults.messageBody:
Added Search class add search functionality

Updated CommandProcessor, Storage, TempStorage to reflect changes

Updated Task and subclasses to have a getter for the taskName

* branch-level-9:
  Add Level-9 requirements

Added Unit Testing with JUnit for the following classes:
* TimeProcessor
* Task
* Deadline
* Event
* Todo

Tested JAR file capability with ShadowJar and it works fine

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename constants to follow coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Renamed the constants in the following classes to reflect the coding
standard:

* Codec
* TimeProcessor

Updated UserInterface to configure the Scanner object in the try block

There is room to improve with the exception classes, and how it was
implemented and handled in the code. I added a new class HalException
to be the parent class for the rest of the new exceptions that I defined

Added JavaDoc to the following classes:
* HalException

Added a close() method to UserInterface and all encapsulated classes:
* CommandProcessor
* Storage
* LocalStorage

Shifted method processCommand into the enum Commmand class

* branch-A-JavaDoc:
  Add JavaDoc to remaining classes

commitResults.messageTitle: Follow Coding Standard for remaining classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Used check style to ensure that all the classes were in line with the
coding standard, along with the use of exceptions. In this case,
TempStorage had issues with catch-all exception handling that was
corrected

ProcessingException class has a new method added:
* exceptionCommandExecution

InputExcpetion class has the following method refactored:
* exceptionCommandProcessing is now exceptionCommandParsing

* branch-A-CodingStandard:
  Follow Coding Standard for remaining classes

commitResults.messageTitle: Update functionality of mark and unmark
commitResults.messageBody:
The mark and unmark commands will now show a message if the user is
trying to mark (or unmark) a task that is already marked (or unmarked)

Updated InputException, Processing Exception to always end with a
newline when messages are printed

Updated .gitignore to ignore .txt files generated by HAL9000

The barebones of the GUI with no logic was added, and placeholder
classes were used to make things run. This commit was more to learn
the functionalities of JavaFX

A new package Graphics was added with the following classes:
* Graphics
* DialogBox
* Launcher
* MainWindow
* MyClass

Resources added:
* dave.png
* hal9000.png
* DialogBox.fxml
* MainWindow.fxml

Edited DialogBox.fxml to improve the CSS and style of the bot

Updated placeholder class to change behavior

Updated DialogBox class by making the flip() method more
streamlined.

All that is left for this level is to tidy up the code, and replace
the placeholder class with the actual Duke UI

commitResults.messageTitle: Change UserInterface to return strings instead of printing to CLI
commitResults.messageBody:
The following classes were changed to return String instead of printing
to CLI:
* CommandProcessor
* Storage
* TempStorage
* UserInterface

GUI was updated, with the following classes changed:
* Graphics
* MainWindow

Task::toString was updated so that the whitespace to represent when an
task was unmarked, was a bit larger and more apparent

Created a new class to replace the old UserInterface class. This is to
push functionality to the GraphicalUI class (formerly Graphics) and to
encapsulate all the logic in the Logic class.

There are still minor bug fixes to be made with the responses from the
chatbot, but the main functionality is there.

Tests were updated to reflect the change in the Task::toString method
as seen in a previous commit.

Duke class is now the main entry point of the application, and replaces
the Launcher class.

* branch-Level-10:
  Integrate GUI and Logic
  Change UserInterface to return strings instead of printing to CLI
  Update GUI
  Add GUI (placeholder)

commitResults.messageTitle: Update save file and data directory
commitResults.messageBody:
Updated the storage of the save data, to have its own directory and the
following classes were modified for the above change:
* Storage
* LocalStorage
* Logic

Exceptions were fixed so the error messages were nicely formatted:
* InputException
* ProcessingException

Fixed trailing newlines in Command class
Fixed boolean variable naming in Logic class

Fixed small formatting errors in JavaDocs for the following classes:
* HalException
* ProcessingException
* StartUpException

Changed JavaFX versions to be compatible, .fxml files affected:
* MainWindow.fxml
* DialogBox.fxml

Added logic to Command class to handle not commands that were not
lower case

Added assertions to CommandProcessor::processCommand to ensure that the
Command does not fall through the switch case

Added assertions to TempStorage::load to ensure that the list is empty
when the load() function is called

Amended Storage and LocalStorage to allow for the save functionality to
work without the redundant function LocalStorage::clearall

Added guard clauses instead of if-else statements because it improved
readability. Affected the following classes:
* TempStorage

Merge branch 'branch-A-Assertions'

Changed JavaFX versions to be compatible, .fxml files affected:

MainWindow.fxml
DialogBox.fxml
Added logic to Command class to handle not commands that were not lower case

Added assertions to CommandProcessor::processCommand to ensure that the Command does not fall through the switch case

Added assertions to TempStorage::load to ensure that the list is empty when the load() function is called

Amended Storage and LocalStorage to allow for the save functionality to work without the redundant function LocalStorage::clearall

Update CodeQuality

Added guard clauses instead of if-else statements because it improved readability. Affected the following classes:

* TempStorage

The following commands were added:
* REDO
* UNDO

which led to the update of the following classes to handle the new
commands:
*Command
*CommandProcessor

The package history was created with the following classes:
* History
* HistoryManager
* State

All Tasks were made to implement Cloneable and Serializable Interfaces
but the work has not been implemented fully. Deadline, Event still need
to be done properly.

Storage and Temp storage were updated to facilitate the undo and redo
commands but the actual functionality has not been done fully.

Completed undo extension by integrating a start state that is set at
start up. The following classes were modified:
* History
* HistoryManager
* State
There was a bug where objects in the state were still pointing to the
same values, so cloning objects was not a deepcopy. This was fixed by
using the clone method in TempStorage::restore as well

Removed Cloneable interface and methods in Task and Todo.

* branch-BCD-Extension:
  Complete undo extension
  Add undo extension

Added Icon and Title to GUI

Removed System.out::println used for debugging from the following
classes:
* HistoryManager
* TempStorage
* Command Processor

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug in undoing unmark command
commitResults.messageBody:
Fixed a bug in undoing unmark command where undo failed to ignore unmark
commands that were unmarking a task that was already unmarked. The
following classes were changed:
* TempStorage

Removed redundant methods and made some fields final in these classes:
* Task
* History

Updated GUI to have background. Classes changed:
* MainWindow
* MainWindow.fxml
* background.png
* application.css

Updated HistoryManager to remove the history file entirely as it was
buggy. Files changed:
* Logic
* CommandProcessor
* HistoryManager

Renamed boolean field for Task
Setup the website and include the screenshot

Updated the user guide in the README.md

JavaDocs were updated for the remaining files.
